name: Truly-Protect
summary: VM-based framework for digital rights management.
short_description:
Truly-Protect is 
a system incorporating a virtual machine,
that enables execution of encrypted programs.
Our intention is to form a framework for a conditional
access/digital rights management system.  

We avoid relying on obscurity and rely only on assumptions about the system 
itself and on cryptographic measures to develop VM-based conditional 
access/trusted computing environment.
